title: Ambient Orchestral Strings
description: A collection of fifteen lush and beautiful orchestral string tracks with a smooth, ambient, background character.
longDescription:
A collection of fifteen lush and beautiful orchestral string tracks with a smooth, ambient, background character. This music is designed to function in a subtle way, adding a dimension of emotionality to your game.


Fifteen original tracks:

1. Ambient Rising Strings 2:32

2. Ambient Strings Bliss 2:12

3. Beautiful Calm Regal Strings 2:25

4. Beautiful Surging Strings 1:27

5. Beauty of Strings 2:41

6. Dark Fantasy Cinematic Strings 1:44

7. Emotional Strings 1:16

8. Epic Strings Moment 0:47

9. Hypnotic String Adagio 2:12

10. Intricate Fantasy Strings 2:09

11. Pulsing Beautiful String Soundscape 1:48

12. Uplifting String Backdrop 1:10

13. Warm Cinematic Strings 2:25

14. Regal Orchestral Soundtrack 2:37

15. Romaintic String Orchestra Build 2:15


Listen to a sampler of the tracks included here.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • High quality original compositions
  • Quick and responsive support
  • Only available in this pack

Number of Audio Wavs: 15

Number of Audio Cues: 15

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: no, but could be made to loop easily

Minutes of Audio Provided: 32

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All

Documentation: sampler of the tracks
